Class SymmetricKeyReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.generator.receiver.SymmetricKeyReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Receiver

    public class SymmetricKeyReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Receiver
    Receiver when enveloping the symmetric encryption key with another symmetric key.
